LanguageData.TiberiumResearch.label: tiberium base research
LanguageData.TiberiumResearch.description: Allows the research of Tiberium technologies:\n\n -Construction of the Tiberium Research Building
LanguageData.TiberiumKnowledge.label: tiberium knowledge
LanguageData.TiberiumKnowledge.description:
Allows the understanding of Tiberium:

 -Craft Tiberium (lore) books

 -Craft Tiberium Protection Suits.
LanguageData.TiberiumResearchRefining.label: tiberium Refining
LanguageData.TiberiumResearchRefining.description: Allows Tiberium to be refined.\n\n -Construction of the Tiberium refinery
LanguageData.TiberiumPower.label: tiberium Power
LanguageData.TiberiumPower.description: Allows the construction of the Tiberium power plant.
LanguageData.TiberiumInhibition.label: Tiberium Inhibition
LanguageData.TiberiumInhibition.description: Exploit the nature of Tiberium and stop it from spreading further:\n\n -Construction of deep ground freezer
LanguageData.TiberiumInhibitionTribal.label: Tiberium Growth Block
LanguageData.TiberiumInhibitionTribal.description: Your tribe found a clever idea on how to reduce Tiberium threat. An ice box so cold it freezes the ground in a small radius around itself.
